metadata.title: CVE-2017-18230 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26. A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability was found in the function ReadCINEONImage in coders/cineon.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file. It was discovered that GraphicsMagick incorrectly handled certain image files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.28-1').
